0110011110011000 0101010111011011 1 -> sum: 1011110101110100, cout: 0
0010010000000011 0011000010100111 1 -> sum: 0101010010101011, cout: 0
1101100011011111 1001111110101000 1 -> sum: 0111100010001000, cout: 1
0101111010011011 0001111001001110 0 -> sum: 0111110011101001, cout: 0
1000001111110110 0010100011000000 0 -> sum: 1010110010110110, cout: 0
0000011101111001 1100111010000111 1 -> sum: 1101011000000001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
